text: 5. Random variables X,Y have joint pdf f(z,y) = z + 2yÂ° on [0,1] x [0,1] and 0 outside that square. (a) What is the marginal distribution of X? (b) What is the marginal distribution of Y'? (c) Are they independent? (justify!) (d) What is Cov(X,Y)? (Write the needed integrals; compute them if you have time.)
